scripts.build-native: napi build --platform -p next-napi-bindings --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_napi_bindings --features plugin,image-extended --js false native
scripts.build-native-release: napi build --platform -p next-napi-bindings --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_napi_bindings --release --features plugin,image-extended,tracing/release_max_level_trace --js false native
scripts.build-native-release-with-assertions: napi build --platform -p next-napi-bindings --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_napi_bindings --profile release-with-assertions --features plugin,image-extended,tracing/release_max_level_trace --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin: napi build --platform -p next-napi-bindings --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_napi_bindings --features image-webp --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin-release: napi build --platform -p next-napi-bindings --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_napi_bindings --release --features image-webp,tracing/release_max_level_trace --js false native
scripts.build-native-wasi: npx --package=@napi-rs/cli@3.0.0-alpha.45 napi build --platform --target wasm32-wasip1-threads -p next-napi-bindings --cwd ../../ --output-dir packages/next-swc/native --no-default-features
scripts.test-cargo-unit: cargo nextest run --workspace --exclude next-napi-bindings --exclude turbo-tasks-macros --cargo-profile release-with-assertions --no-fail-fast
